> Just FYI, Code Warior is actully an IDE, not a compiler (I don't know what 
 compiler it uses).  Also, MS Visual C++ is generally reguarded as one of the 
 best IDE's out there; if you've got that you may want to give it another try. 

I tried to understand a simple "Hello World" program written in that language and had difficulty.  Maybe it's because it's truly object 
oriented and I haven't had a truely object oriented programming class.  It might be easier after I've had studied true object oriented 
programming.
